contacts.name: Erlich Bachman
contacts.tagline: Today's user wants access to all their files, from all of their devices, instantly. That's why cloud-based is the Holy Grail. But when it comes to audio and video files, they might as well be called Dripbox.

contacts.name: Dinesh Chugtai
contacts.tagline: No, my software's fine. It's 'cause it's running on your s*** hardware.

contacts.name: Gilfoyle Bertram
contacts.tagline: But does anyone appreciate that? While you were busy minoring in gender studies and singing a capella at Sarah Lawrence, I was gaining root access to NSA servers. I was one click away from starting a second Iranian revolution.
